name: I'm Jlime （demo）
description:
Hi everyone, this is a 2d platformer game I'm trying to make.

 It's an easy-to-play game.

The current version only completes 25% of the number of levels.

↑ :jump

←& → :change player direction

Jump again and again.

Going back to the starting place again and again.

You can succeed as long as you don't give up.
